en.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Steel Meridian’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Protector.

ru.description: Один из шести основных синдикатов, лидером которым является Кресса Тэл. Имеют в своём арсенале моды для таких варфреймов, как Эмбер, Экскалибур, Фрост, Миса, Нова, Оберон, Рино, Сарина и Атлас.

ko.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Steel Meridian’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Protector.

de.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Steel Meridian’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Protector.

fr.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Steel Meridian’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Protector.

pt.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Steel Meridian’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Protector.

zh-hans.description: 与钢铁防线结盟的Tenno在获得保卫者称号后，可以获得这些独特的强化Mod，用于钢铁防线偏好的武器和战甲。

zh-hant.description: 與均衡仲裁者結盟的Tenno在獲得保衛者稱號後，可以獲得這些獨特的強化Mod，用於鋼鐵防線偏好的武器和戰甲。

es.description: Los Tenno quienes se unan por si mismos a este Sindicatos tendrán acceso a Mods de aumento únicos para armas que favorecen al Meridiano de Acero después de obtener el titulo de Venerado.

it.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Steel Meridian’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Protector.
